title.bibl: Scrapbooks, Vol. II, in possession of Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 North Broadway, Chicago, Ill. Presentation of Russian Play at Empire Theatre.

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

div.bibl: Scrapbooks, Vol. II, in possession of Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 North Broadway, Chicago, Ill. PRESENTATION OF RUSSIAN PLAY AT EMPIRE THEATRE.

body.p: The play, "Na Drye," was given at the Empire Theatre, Madison near Halsted, on May 12, 1919. A. E. Pokatilov directed, Russian actors from New York, Detroit and Chicago took part.
